about_the_game:
Make your own tile-based Metroidvania world!

In the map maker, create your own world with drag-and-drop maker tiles that include:
  • Destructible and indestructible terrain,
  • Collectable abilities ranging from weapon upgrades to additional jumps,
  • Various enemy types with unique behaviors,
  • Start points, checkpoints, and goal points,
  • and more to come as development progresses!

This demo version of Creator's Asteroid showcases Maker Mode in a 2x2 world. Grab the full game for a more expansive world, and to share and play worlds!

Content will be added periodically as development progresses through Early Access (including new maker tiles, updated sound and art, and other improvements).
